segments.text: My attention is drawn to the two children on the left side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, they are definitely up to something mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is perched precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet, straight for the cookie jar!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That jar is clearly labeled 'COOKIE JAR' and it's full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is standing beside him, looking on eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, waiting for her share, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a daring feat, considering how unstable that stool looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really should tell them they could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely breaking some household rules right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is impressive, I must admit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stop them before they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
